thread.title: Portland mayor sets expectations for Inauguration Day marches: No blocking of freeways, MAX trains
thread.title_full: Portland mayor sets expectations for Inauguration Day marches: No blocking of freeways, MAX trains

author: Maxine Bernstein | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Portland mayor sets expectations for Inauguration Day marches: No blocking of freeways, MAX trains
text: Mayor Ted Wheeler said he doesn't want the city to be defined by the violent footage that marred Election Night protests in November and was "broadcast all around the planet,'' which showed people smashing out car windshields or storefronts with bats, or setting newspaper stands or trash bins on fire. "That's not who we are,'' Wheeler said Wednesday.
